title: Question 24
prompt: _________________. You should start by setting up a meeting with your guidance counselor at school to get some advice. Another option would be to use an online search engine to help you find potential scholarships. By doing so, you may be able to lower the high cost of college tuition.
description: Read the paragraph.  Then choose the sentence that best fills the blank in the paragraph.
feedback: The best choice for a topic sentence in this paragraph is “There are several different ways that a student can earn a college scholarship.” This is a general sentence that summarizes the paragraph.  The sentences that follow the topic sentence support, or provide detail, to the main idea.
